body.name: Air Purifiers for Home Large Room Up to 1736 sqft, HEPA Air Purifier with Meteor Shower Atmosphere Light, Fragrance Sponge, PM2.5 Detector Air Cleaner for Pet Dander Wildfire Smoke Pollen Odor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 32 mins
features: [High Efficiency Air Purifier] The air purifiers for bedroom that covers up to 1736 square feet within 1 hour. The home air purifiers have a powerful 4-stage filtration system that can efficiently capture 99.97% of air particles from all around as small as 0.3 microns. Turn on the high-efficiency air purifier large room to enjoy a new and comfortable air environment all the time.

[Original Patent: Unique Room Air Purifier Air Inlet Design] When turning on the HEPA air purifiers for home, the meteor shower atmosphere light will turn on like an aurora, purifying the air while bringing the ultimate aesthetic enjoyment. 2 choosable light moods: light and strong. To ensure the light effect please keep the label down when place the air filter in.
[Fragrance Sponge] The top of the large room air purifier is equipped with an essential oil cotton pad. Add the essential oil to enjoy fresh and fragrant air.

[PM2.5 Detector] The built-in PM2.5 detector works while the air purifier for bedroom turns on, monitoring the real-time air quality. The larger the value, the worse the air quality, while the smaller the better. Please note that the PM2.5 value is for reference only and is not authoritative.

[Ultra-Quiet Sleep Mode] The air purifiers for pets work at sleep mode at 15dB, which is ultra quiet. Enjoy a comfortable and soft environment when sleeping. All keys' light will turn off, while the meteor shower atmosphere light should be turned off manually.

[Filter Replacement Reminder] The air cleaner large room is equipped with a filter replacement reminder, guaranteeing to enjoy fresh air all the time. When the filter reaches the end of the life, the reminder will turn red and flash. After replacing the filter, please press and hold the reminder button for 3-5 second, and the filter reminder will be reset. To ensure the purification effect of the HEPA filter air purifiers, please use official "LAMPICK" filter elements.
[5 Timer Setting] The pet air purifier is designed with an adjustable timer for 2/4/6/8/12 hours. Set the usage time flexibly and refresh the air at regular intervals.

[3 Fan Speeds] The bedroom air purifier offers three choosable gears of air flow from Ⅰ, Ⅱ to Ⅲ. When the office air purifier works at the auto mode, the machine will automatically select the appropriate speed based on the air quality detected by the sensor.
[Child Lock] Press the "Lock" button to lock the current setting of the smart air purifier at any time to prevent children or pets from accidentally touching the buttons.
[Official Air Purifier Filter] Get the LAMPICK air filter at: B0CQ2FH2XV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect whole-room air purifier!
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this air purifier. To start, I was completely surprised by its size; the photos are true to scale, and I was honestly not expecting that. The filter is incredibly durable and made from high quality materials, and the machine operates quietly even at the highest setting. The blue night light is a greatly appreciated feature! We have a parakeet, a Great Pyrenees, and a cat, and naturally our living room can get a little musty, but ever since we set up this air purifier the entire living room/dining room/kitchen (a good ~800 sq ft of our open floor plan home) feels light and fresh, even cooking odors (we use A LOT of spice) are gone in a flash. We haven't used the aroma therapy feature yet because of the bird, but I'm looking into safe essential oils because I can't wait to test that feature! The child lock is a huge bonus, as well; my youngest loves to push buttons and is obsessed with anything that looks like a fan, so this was definitely a huge hit with him. Great value for the money, I plan on getting another for our bedroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice operational features / can do Aromatherapy, too!
reviews.reviewText: ) I really like the design and build quality of this Purifier. It has a soft blue glowing light that you can use as a night light (or turn it off if you don’t want it). It has 3 fan speeds, a timer button (useful if you want it on for a certain number of hours, then it will automatically turn off), a child lock-out button so little ones won’t inadvertently turn it on, and a reset button. The reset is for when you replace the filter after 1440 hours of run time. The machine is fairly quiet, even on high fan speed, and it blows a gentle air from the top. I do not have measuring equipment to verify how much dust/allergens are removed from the air, but the filter is built such that I would believe the manufacturer’s statements. I did place it near the kitchen when we had fragrant food cooking, and it did eliminate the smell within 10 minutes, so that was impressive. It also comes with aromatherapy diffusers, if you like to do that. Replacement filters can be bought off Amazon…..just search for B-D02U filters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I've had this air purifier running full time for about a month. I tested out all the settings and found them easy to understand and operate. I usually run it on low with the night light on. On that setting it makes no noise at all that I can hear. High fan setting gets me fan noise but nothing loud or bothersome. I came with all the filters necessary but I unfortunately can't find any information on how to order replacement filters which I will need to do in about 3-4 months, or when the purifier indicates that I need to replace the filter. That's a problematic omission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stuffy house odors are gone! Yay!
reviews.reviewText: A closed up house, in the winter especially, can have a stuffy closed up smell, but not after running this impressive air purifier only one day. Ours is set up near the family room, living room, and kitchen area of the house, and after 5-6 hours I began to notice how fresh the air seemed. To test, I added some lavender essential oil in the air and put the setting on high. Within just a short time, the lavender smell disappeared. Works very well!I found the replacement filter listing in Amazon, then created a List (see below the pricing information on the item listing, click the "Add to List" drop-down arrow, create a List - I named mine "Electronics"- and now the item is saved and available anytime I'm ready to order it.)We're thinking of ordering a second unit to put near the bedrooms. The unit is very quiet and we like the idea that the air we breathe every night will be clean and clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suitable Size and Quiet
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is cylinder like shape with about 1 feet height and 7 inches in diameter. The size is suitable and won’t be bulky. This purifier has 3-stage filtration by preliminary filtering through outer fabric, then pass through the HEPA filter and finally purifies by the activated carbon filter. There is indicator light to remind the replacement of filter after it has been used for more than 1440 hours.The purifier has three levels of fan speed to select according to different conditions and air quality. Moreover, there is a top aromatherapy diffuser for placing aroma pad so that essential oils can be dropped to create fragrant air. There are totally three aroma pads are provided in the package.I like the night light feature of the air purifier. In addition, there are timer and sleep mode for selection so that the purifier will run quietly with all indicator-lights off and automatically stops after the selected hours. In fact, even it runs at the high-speed fan, the sound is low and won’t be annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Purifiers for Small Room
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product just because the air in the house always smells dusty. There isn't any dust but my place is on the bottom floor and just a lot of smells. I ordered the Purifier and it shipped really quickly and arrived without any damage. I currently have mine set to run constantly but there are many other options. Everything from fan speed to timers and it can be used as a nightlight as well. I have been running it for a couple weeks straight and maybe its just me but it smells better and no dusty smell. I recommend this product because it does everything it says it does. The price point is right and I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, instructions lack, and no info on replacement filters
reviews.reviewText: I like how it operates and the quietness and the calming bluelight (I keep in bedroom). However the instructions leave out a lot of details like replacement filter model numbers. It they improve the instructions and list easy to reference replacement part numbers, this would get a 5 star review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and use.
reviews.reviewText: This B-D02U air purifier works very well. I use this purifier in my office where I keep my 3-D Printer, I needed something that would remove particulates and smell caused by printing ABS and PETG. This unit moves a lot of air and seems to be keeping the smell at a minimum. It has several modes of adjustment so that I can run it at full blast during printing or slow it down when I’m just working in my office.The air purifier has a great presentation as is well made, it does come with aromatherapy diffuser pads, it’s a great idea but I have no need of those. Overall, I am pleased with his purifier and the level of particulate it can remove from the air during printing.
